events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of the vehicle collision and damages involved.
An agent with experience in auto claims has been assigned to handle this vehicle collision case and communicate with the claimant.
We have formally acknowledged receipt of your vehicle accident claim and will proceed with the investigation shortly.
Please provide the police report, photos of the damaged car, and any medical reports related to the accident for further assessment.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the accident report, vehicle damage photos, and medical bills from the hospital.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted documents and is reaching out to involved parties for additional information.
The investigation into the collision has been completed, confirming liability and damage extent with all evidence validated.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the assessed damages and medical expenses to ensure fair compensation.
The customer confirmed satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
The claim has been officially approved following the customer's acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim has been processed and released to the customer's account as per the agreed settlement.
The vehicle accident claim case has been closed successfully after all payments were made and the customer was fully compensated.
